= quality( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments match an items quality

== Arguments ==

 * arg1..N (numeric or string) = item quality

== Remarks ==

  * you can use either the numeric value or the localised text value as an argument

  * 0 or "Poor" = grey

  * 1 or "Common" = white

  * 2 or "Uncommon" = green

  * 3 or "Rare" = blue

  * 4 or "Epic" = purple

  * 5 or "Legendary" = orange

  * 6 or "Artifact" = red

  * 7 or "Heirloom" = gold

== Examples ==

  * `quality( "poor" )`

  * `quality( 5, 6 )`
